channel.title: Discovering the next convergence in Information Technology and Information Security Automation

item.title: No title
item.description: Looking for SDN Resources? There are a large number of them.  We aren't going to try to bring them all together here.  That's not efficient.  However, we are going to put out some pointers for those of you who are looking for more information.

item.title: Convergence: Understanding and Aligning Orchestration, Automation, NFV and SDN
item.description:
Convergence: Understanding and Aligning Orchestration, Automation, NFV and SDN

Looking at what is coming on the horizon for the next big leap in Computing and Network Automation
